enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Spanish Studies students.
title: WCAS SPANISH 199-0-20 Language in Context: Contemporary Spain
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
An introduction to the culture and sociopolitical issues of contemporary Spain in the basis for review of some problematic grammatical patterns and for skill-building in Spanish.
Three class meetings a week
Prerequisite: 121-3, 125-0, AP score of 4 on the Spanish Language and/or Literature, or departmental Spanish Language Placement Exam
No P/N

subject: SPANISH
